1.0.name: wordpress/beach
1.0.description: Beach brings the warm feel of Thailand’s shores to your blog year round. Originally designed for Drupal Thailand by Gibbo, Beach features special post formatting for Aside, Gallery, Quote, and Status posts, along with a beautiful secondary menu area in the header.
